description:
We're adding the "Magic Soda" mini-game to "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of "Viviter"! Let's not be too formal. Allow me to pour it for you, so let's take a big gulp to start!
The essence of hospitality lies in serving delicious soda! No matter who the guest is, if they enjoy their drink, they might just agree to a contract happily.
Now's the time to showcase your skills! Determine the perfect pour, right up to the brimâ€”It's now or never!
name: Additional mini-game "Magic Soda"
